source.text: How do you want to play

card.question: Do you know what this means?

empty.title: You did it all!
empty.text:
There are no cards to train with at the moment.

We use spaced repetition to improve your ability to memorize new lemmas; And at the moment you trained on all available cards.

read.after: and find new word to add to you Vocabulary.

alert.message: Are you sure you want to mark this card as complete?
